instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1706: What is A1706? A1706 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2016, Mid 2017 with EMC 3071, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00239, 820-00923..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 820 - 00239 A short on PPBUS G3H
threads.message:
Hey guys, have a Macbook here with a short on PPBUS G3H which is solved, I now have a booting macbook 

Though the issue is the fan closest to the touch pad connection (J4501) goes full spin when booting, and the other fan wont spin at all with J4501 connected to the flex. 

If I leave the flex disconnected the fan closest goes full on while the other one is normal speed.

The PPBUS that was short to ground was CB702, unsure if this matters or not, it's just near the flex :) 

Thanks in advance for your help!

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 820 - 00239 A short on PPBUS G3H
threads.message:
Do PRAM reset 2-3 times, just in case.

Start in diagnostic mode and see what errors pop up.
Run HWMonitor and look for strange temps reported.
Test the machine disconnecting webcam.

Try the board in known good shell.
